title: eBikes Rental Brno
opening_hours: Opening hours: Only up to prior agreement
rental_terms: The rental terms (pick-up/return) must be agreed upon in advance by phone or email.
deposit_requirement: When picking up the e-bike, a refundable deposit of 10,000 CZK must be paid in cash. Two photo ID documents are required (ID card, driver's license, passport, ...)
